Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Pitcher
Description: Pitcher with narrow mouth, rounded rim and short bottleneck. Unstable base with convex bottom. Paste of an orangey colour. Exterior surface covered with a coating of a reddish colour, polished and partially lost. It has a painted decoration in the upper third: a wide band in black, demarcated by other lines in black.
